titles: A vvarning to all in this proud city called London to call them to repentance least the wrath of the Lord break out against them; this is the day of your visitation if you will own it.
author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: London (England) --  History --  Prophecies --  Early works to 1800.
